title: Tackle & solve impossible problems
description: 信頼を回復し、共通の利益を促進し、現実世界の困難な問題を解決するために、どのようにして具体的なプロジェクトを実施するか。

f6_assessments.q0:
Solving difficult real-world problems aligns with the Cardano mission of driving adoption of Cardano. Cardano can be adopted without solving generic difficult real-world problems therefore it is not a critical challenge.
I neither agree nor disagree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
Can the Catalyst community do the impossible? Possibly.
I neither agree nor disagree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question. The key metrics are confusing in that they are based upon fully developed proposals. To the best of my understanding, the objective of the challenge is to have teams propose to develop proposals that solve real world problems however in the submitting proposal they need to provide the solution which they are going to later develop the proposal to solve?
I disagree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

importance: ブロックチェーン技術は、問題を探すための解決策として敬遠されがちです。
success: 既存のノウハウ、ブロックチェーンの開発・研究を活かして、これまで解決できなかった問題を解決することに成功しました
